title: Gorgeous
lyrics: You should take it as a compliment<BREAKER>That I got drunk and made fun of the way you talk<BREAKER>You should think about the consequence<BREAKER>Of your magnetic field being a little too strong<BREAKER>And I got a boyfriend, he's older than us<BREAKER>He's in the club doing, I don't know what<BREAKER>You're so cool, it makes me hate you so much (I hate you so much)
Whisky on ice, Sunset and Vine<BREAKER>You've ruined my life, by not being mine

You're so gorgeous<BREAKER>I can't say anything to your face<BREAKER>'Cause look at your face (gorgeous)<BREAKER>And I'm so furious<BREAKER>At you for making me feel this way<BREAKER>But what can I say?<BREAKER>You're gorgeous

You should take it as a compliment<BREAKER>That I'm talking to everyone here but you (but you, but you)<BREAKER>And you should think about the consequence<BREAKER>Of you touching my hand in the darkened room (dark room, dark room)<BREAKER>If you've got a girlfriend, I'm jealous of her<BREAKER>But if you're single that's honestly worse<BREAKER>'Cause you're so gorgeous it actually hurts<BREAKER>(Honey, it hurts)
Ocean blue eyes looking in mine<BREAKER>I feel like I might sink and drown and die

You're so gorgeous<BREAKER>I can't say anything to your face (to your face)<BREAKER>'Cause look at your face (look at your face)<BREAKER>And I'm so furious<BREAKER>At you for making me feel this way (this way)<BREAKER>But what can I say?<BREAKER>You're gorgeous

You make me so happy, it turns back to sad, yeah<BREAKER>There's nothing I hate more than what I can't have<BREAKER>You are so gorgeous it makes me so mad (mmh)<BREAKER>You make me so happy, it turns back to sad, yeah<BREAKER>There's nothing I hate more than what I can't have and<BREAKER>Guess I'll just stumble on home to my cats (yeugh)<BREAKER>Alone, unless you wanna come along (oh)

You're so gorgeous<BREAKER>I can't say anything to your face (to your face)<BREAKER>'Cause look at your face (look at your face, gorgeous)<BREAKER>And I'm so furious (I'm so furious)<BREAKER>At you for making me feel this way (feel this way)<BREAKER>But what can I say? (I say)<BREAKER>You're gorgeous

You make me so happy, it turns back to sad, yeah<BREAKER>There's nothing I hate more than what I can't have and<BREAKER>You are so gorgeous it makes me so mad (mmh)<BREAKER>You're gorgeous<BREAKER>You make me so happy, it turns back to sad, yeah (it turns back so sad)<BREAKER>There's nothing I hate more than what I can't have (what I can have)<BREAKER>You are so gorgeous it makes me so mad (mmh)<BREAKER>You're gorgeous
